snippet.title: PuffPals Island Skies
snippet.description: PuffPals: Island Skies is a new game from the folks behind PuffPals plushies. "A wholesome life simulator game where you can collect, farm, customize, and explore new lands with cute and fluffy PuffPals!" https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fluffnest/puffpals-island-skies #indiegame #cozygames #puffpals
